API_KEY: Your API Key. If you want help, checkout the readme video: https://github.com/SenaThenu/StudySphere
StudySphere_ID: The Database ID of the StudySphere.
Instructions: Whether instructions should be displayed or not.
Rep_Col_Names: A name list of all columns which store spaced repetition dates.
Rep_Intervals: A list of Spaced Repetition intervals in days.
Notes_Title_Col_Name: The column name which stores the names of notes stored in a branch!
Revision_Col_Name: Name of the column which stores revision dates!
